verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
From the cloud You speak
What was veiled now is seen

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus the image of
The invisible God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Divinity confirmed
In the transfigured Word

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
A kingdom once concealed
On the earth now revealed

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Holy is the Lord revealed before my eyes
And my burning heart can scarcely take it in

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
As I behold your beauty with unworthy eyes
The only song my soul can find to sing

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Is Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah my King

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Lead my longing heart
To the high ground, to the clear view

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
And in awe I'll be there
Beholding You

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Holy is the Lord revealed before my eyes
And my burning heart can scarcely take it in

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
As I behold your beauty with unworthy eyes
The only song my soul can find to sing

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: Is Hallelujah Hallelujah Hallelujah my King

verse.name: v14
verse.lines:
Now I know
I have seen
Your glory that cannot be unseen

verse.name: v15
verse.lines:
I am changed
And changing still
As I look upon you Lord and believe

verse.name: v16
verse.lines:
Holy is the Lord revealed before my eyes
And my burning heart can scarcely take it in

verse.name: v17
verse.lines:
As I behold your beauty with unworthy eyes
The only song my soul can find to sing

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: Is Hallelujah Hallelujah Hallelujah my King
